Body:
fig = output_plots.plot_aggregates(base_tpi, base_params, reform_tpi=
    reform_tpi, reform_params=reform_params, var_list=['Y', 'r'], plot_type
    =plot_type, num_years_to_plot=20, vertical_line_years=
    vertical_line_years, plot_title=plot_title)
assert fig
pytest.mark.parametrize(
    'base_tpi,base_params,reform_tpi,reform_parms,plot_type,' +
    'vertical_line_years,plot_title', test_data, ids=['Pct Diff', 'Diff',
    'CBO', 'Levels w reform', 'Levels w/o reform', 'Vertical line included',
    'Plot title included'])
